#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int power(int x,int n,int p)
{
    long long int ans=1ll;
    while(n>=1)
    {
        if(n & 1)
        {
            ans=((long long)ans*(long long)x)%(long long)p;n-=1;
        }
        else
        {
            x=((long long)x*(long long)x)%(long long)p;
            n=n/2;
        }
    }
    return (int)ans;
}


int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,p;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&p);
        long long int temp1=1ll;
        for(int i=p-2;i>n;i--)
            temp1=(temp1*(long long)i)%(long long)p;
        int temp2=power(temp1,p-2,p);
        printf("%d\n",temp2);
    }

    return 0;
}
